bibl.title: The Medical and Surgical History of the War of the Rebellion. (1861–65.)
bibl.editor: Surgeon General Joseph K. Barnes, United States Army

taxonomy.bibl: Medical and Surgical History of the War of the Rebellion

keywords.term: wounds and injuries of the head

revisionDesc.change: additional proofing of transcription and encoding
case text extracted and transformed from larger file; encoding and transcription further cleaned up by hand
initial checking of OCR text; P5 encoding

body.p: Cockrill, Q. J., Private, Co. G, 5th Alabama. Sabre-cut of the head. Petersburg, Virginia, April 2d, 1865. Admitted to Lincoln Hospital, Washington, April 10th. Sent to Old Capitol Prison, April 25th, 1865, for exchange.
